main.name: Ravi Raj
main.description: Passionate Full Stack Web Developer with a knack for problem- solving and a strong aptitude for teamwork. Dedicated to continuous learning and leveraging the latest technologies to create high-quality, efficient solutions.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Ravi Raj! . I've been coding for over 3 years now. I am a passionate Full Stack Web Developer with experience in building dynamic and scalable applications. With a strong foundation in JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and SQL, I specialize in crafting high-quality solutions that enhance user experience and performance. At Zignuts Technolab, I have led multiple projects, integrating cutting-edge AI technologies, automating testing processes, and developing tools like an in-house coding integration editor for technical interviews. My work also extends to open-source projects, including collaborative coding platforms, eCommerce websites, and cloud storage applications. Always eager to learn and innovate, I thrive on solving complex problems and delivering impactful solutions. Feel free to explore my projects on GitHub and connect with me on LinkedIn!

education.description: I have completed my graduation with 7.9 CGPA.

work.title: Full stack web developer
work.description: At Zignuts Technolab, I worked as a Full Stack Web Developer, leading and contributing to multiple innovative projects. I played a key role in integrating AI technologies into a unified platform, automating testing processes using Puppeteer and Cucumber-js, and developing an in-house coding integration editor used for technical interviews. Additionally, I designed and implemented dynamic admin panels for mobile applications and contributed to the company's success in the AI-Based Hackathon 2024. My work consistently focused on delivering high-quality solutions, leveraging modern technologies, and enhancing development efficiency.

work.title: Full stack web developer inter
work.description: At PeopleMatic Labs, I worked as a Full Stack Web Developer Intern, where I gained hands-on experience managing real-time projects and solving practical challenges. I enhanced my teamwork and collaboration skills by effectively contributing to project execution in a professional environment. This role provided me with valuable insights into handling client requirements and delivering tailored solutions, laying a strong foundation for my career in software development.

testimonials.text: Ravi is absolutely excellent, he is so header worker and quick learner.So, I can say, he will successful in his life and he will be a first class software developer.
Learning with Ravi had been AWESOME, he makes work easy.He's helping me out in many situation. He has a good knowleage on React and their application.
